title: WTB: Allen & Ginter and Goodwin Albums
author: mouschi

posts.post_title: WTB: Allen & Ginter and Goodwin Albums
posts.post_content: I'm looking for a couple albums I can frame from Allen & Ginter and Goodwin.  If you have some let me know!

HERE ARE A FEW OF MINE :-)

While we are on the subject I have an extra Goodwin champions and a few others I might sell or trade.....

[quote name="1880nonsports" post=1963477]HERE ARE A FEW OF MINE :-)

While we are on the subject I have an extra Goodwin champions and a few others I might sell or trade.....[/QUOTE]

Wow those look great together!  I'm mainly looking for the baseball covers and N28 / N162 pages.  If you have any to spare, I'd love to hear it!
